abstract: Moody’s Investors Service on Wednesday cut the debt ratings of Bank of America and sent its rating of the bank’s preferred stock into junk territory, citing an increasing risk that government intervention may be needed to bolster the bank’s capital position.
lead_paragraph: Moody’s Investors Service on Wednesday cut the debt ratings of Bank of America and sent its rating of the bank’s preferred stock into junk territory, citing an increasing risk that government intervention may be needed to bolster the bank’s capital position.

headline.main: Moody’s Cuts Bank of America’s Debt Ratings

abstract: Despite the current problems of Bank of America and Wachovia and the passage of nearly a decade, the two men who built the Charlotte-based firms continue to collect a paycheck or perks from their former employers.
snippet: Despite the current problems of Bank of America and Wachovia and the passage of nearly a decade, the two men who built the Charlotte-based firms continue to collect a paycheck or perks from their former employers.

headline.main: As Banks Flounder, the Perks Play On

abstract: TO: Ken Lewis, chairman and C.E.O., Bank of America CorporationFROM: Jack FlackSUBJECT: Use the Nightmare to Achieve the Dream
lead_paragraph: TO: Ken Lewis, chairman and C.E.O., Bank of America CorporationFROM: Jack FlackSUBJECT: Use the Nightmare to Achieve the Dream

headline.main: How to Win the Spin Game

abstract: Bank of America is folding its Premier Banking unit into Merrill Lynch, laying off several hundred workers, The Wall Street Journal reported Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is folding its Premier Banking unit into Merrill Lynch, laying off several hundred workers, The Wall Street Journal reported Thursday.

headline.main: BofA Said to Fold Premier Banking Unit Into Merrill

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: Bank of America lost another respected investment banker on Thursday, the latest in a long line of Wall Street veterans to leave the bank since it announced the takeover of Merrill Lynch last year.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America lost another respected investment banker on Thursday, the latest in a long line of Wall Street veterans to leave the bank since it announced the takeover of Merrill Lynch last year.

headline.main: Bank of America Loses Yet Another Banker
